personalInfo.name: Dominic Hubble
personalInfo.title: SOFTWARE DEVELOPER & CS STUDENT
personalInfo.bio: Final year Computer Science student at Loughborough University with hands-on experience in software development, affiliate marketing, and project management. Currently working as a Junior Software Developer at MezzeData Limited while building innovative solutions and leading high-performing teams.

story: Originally from the West Midlands, my journey into tech started at the age of 3 with my first iPod. That early exposure sparked a curiosity that's only grown stronger over the years, leading me to pursue Computer Science and Software Development.

What drives me most about this field is the continuous learning â€” there's always something new to discover, master, and create. Currently, I'm a final year Computer Science student at Loughborough University while working as a Junior Software Developer at MezzeData Limited.
